data.message: Dear responsible, As we knew, there is someone responsible of blocking the Singer Abdul Jalil from going to his page on Facebook for unknown reasons and fake excuses, we ask u "we lovers and fans of Abdul jalil Singer" to give him back the right of using his own page he is a great singer and he esteem all the people specialy his fans  and those who has personel reasons to report him does not know him as well they misrule on him Abdul jalil Singer does not ever ill-treat or offence to anyone he is well-intentioned. loving and a reputable person and we do ask u to give him the right back of using his account so we could stay connected to him we hope seeing our singer page back  as soon as possible best regardsز
